sourcesContent:
Remove User
Are you sure want to Remove User?
{{removeUserName}}

By confirming this {{removeUserName}} wouldn't be able to:

  1. Access any projects related to this Account.
  2. Any Personal Data linked with this Account.
import { Component,Input } from '@angular/core'; @Component({ selector: 'app-pop-ups', templateUrl: './pop-ups.component.html', styleUrls: ['./pop-ups.component.css'] }) export class PopUpsComponent { @Input() removeUserName:string=""; pop=1; cancel(){ this.pop=0; } }
